name: Cemetery Gate: The Quiet Arithmetic
description: Cold camphor breathes from the cemetery gate; three skulls mortar the arch, eight guttering candles spit wax, and the falls' iron key rests on moss-slick stone. Naia reads the dates backward while Kassim guards the satchel and Maliya seals wax over her palms.
riddle: Skulls remember, candles confess, the key waits—add the witnesses and the light to reach the next resting place.
